Question.title: Gantt chart
Question.question: What are milestones in Gantt chart?

Option.option: milestones in project plan can help to monitor progress and identify potential delays
links tasks together to ensure work gets done in the right order
it is hierarchical reflection of all the work in the project in terms of deliverables

links tasks together to ensure work gets done in the right order
it is hierarchical reflection of all the work in the project in terms of deliverables
Workbreakdown structure is simply a timeline view of your project
